item.title: ソニー・ピクチャーズ、2021年度営業利益は前年比45％減の$894M、売上高は$851M減、Q4は売上高$271Bで$119Mの利益（Gavin J Blair/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Gavin J Blair / The Hollywood Reporter:
Sony Pictures reports FY 2021 operating income down 45% YoY to $894M, as revenue fell by $851M, and a Q4 profit of $119M on revenue of $2.71B  —  Sony's movie division was hurt by a lack of big hits and one-off gains, while music and sensors businesses continue to thrive.

item.title: リチャード・シャープは、ボリス・ジョンソンにローンを組ませたことや、ゲイリー・リネカー問題への対応をめぐり、数カ月にわたる圧力を受け、BBCの会長を辞任した（Jim Waterson/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Jim Waterson / The Guardian:
Richard Sharp resigns as BBC chair after months of mounting pressure over his role in helping Boris Johnson get a loan and handling of the Gary Lineker row  —  Investigation says Sharp broke rules on public appointments, creating ‘potential perceived conflict of interest’

item.title: ファイリングしています：Trillerは、Sony Musicに$4.5M+を支払い、Trillerがプラットフォーム上でのミュージシャンの楽曲使用をカバーする契約に違反したという主張を解決することに同意する（Blake Brittain/Reuters)
item.description:
Blake Brittain / Reuters:
Filing: Triller agrees to pay Sony Music $4.5M+ to settle claims that Triller breached a contract covering its use of musicians' songs on the platform  —  TikTok rival Triller Inc has agreed to pay Sony Music Entertainment (6758.T) more than $4.5 million to resolve claims that Triller breached …

item.title: Pinterest、初の広告パートナーであるAmazonとの複数年にわたる戦略的広告パートナーシップを発表、より多くのブランドと関連製品をソーシャルネットワークにもたらす（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
Pinterest announces a multi-year strategic ad partnership with Amazon, its first ads partner, to bring more brands and relevant products to the social network  —  Pinterest today announced a multiyear strategic ad partnership with Amazon aimed at bringing more brands and relevant products to its platform.

item.title: Fox傘下のアニメーションスタジオBento Box Entertainmentの共同創業者兼CEOで、FoxのBlockchain Creative LabsのCEOであるScott Greenberg氏が5月19日に退社する（Peter White/Deadline）．
item.description:
Peter White / Deadline:
Scott Greenberg, co-founder and CEO of Fox-owned animation studio Bento Box Entertainment and CEO of Fox's Blockchain Creative Labs, is leaving on May 19  —  EXCLUSIVE: Scott Greenberg, co-founder and CEO of Fox's animation studio Bento Box Entertainment, the company behind Dan Harmon's Krapopolis …

item.title: カナダのオンラインストリーミング法が議会の最終ハードルを通過、ストリーマーにカナダのコンテンツをサポートすることを義務付け、CRTCに規制権を与える（Raisa Patel/Toronto Star)
item.description:
Raisa Patel / Toronto Star:
Canada's Online Streaming Act passes final hurdle in Parliament; it requires streamers to support Canadian content and gives the CRTC regulatory power over them  —  Bill C-11 was introduced early last year in an attempt to subject streaming giants like Netflix, Disney Plus …

item.title: 無料の広告付きストリーミングサービス「Pluto TV」は、Walmart+の加入者に、毎月初めにローテーションで予定されている広告なしの厳選されたコンテンツを提供します（Matt Tamanini/The Streamable）。
item.description:
Matt Tamanini / The Streamable:
The free, ad-supported Pluto TV streaming service offers Walmart+ subscribers select content without ads, scheduled to rotate at the beginning of each month  —  When Walmart announced that it would be including the Paramount+ subscription video-on-demand (SVOD) streaming service as part …

item.title: バイデン大統領が記者の質問を予告するメモ用紙を手にした写真から、大統領の記者会見を演出する長年の慣習が明らかになった（Paul Farhi/Washington Post)
item.description:
Paul Farhi / Washington Post:
Photos of President Biden holding a notecard previewing a reporter's question reveal the long-standing practice of stage-managing presidential news conferences  —  President Biden was photographed holding a note card Wednesday, revealing the stage managing behind many political media events

item.title: クラブハウス、「数年の滑走路」を謳うも50％以上の従業員を解雇し「リセット」を計画、クラブハウスは2022年10月に〜100人のスタッフがいた（Ellen Huet/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Ellen Huet / Bloomberg:
Clubhouse plans to lay off 50%+ of its employees and “reset” the company, despite claiming to have “years of runway”; Clubhouse had ~100 staff in October 2022  —  Clubhouse, the pandemic-era social media sensation, is cutting more than half of its employees, the company said in a blog post on Thursday.

item.title: アマゾン、第1四半期の広告収入は前年同期比21％増の95億ドル（推定91億ドル）、サブスクリプション収入は同15％増の97億ドル、北米セグメントの売上高は同11％増の769億ドル（Annie Palmer/CNBC）。
item.description:
Annie Palmer / CNBC:
Amazon reports Q1 ad revenue up 21% YoY to $9.5B, vs. $9.1B est., subscription revenue up 15% YoY to $9.7B, and North America segment sales up 11% YoY to $76.9B  —  @HTTPS://WWW.LINKEDIN.COM/IN/ ANNIERPALMER/@ANNIERPALMER  — Amazon CEO Andy Jassy has been aggressively cutting costs across the company.

item.title: YouTube Music、Android、iOS、WebでPodcastを追加、Premiumの有無にかかわらず、米国の全ユーザーでオフライン、バックグラウンドでの聴取、キャストに対応（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
YouTube Music adds podcasts on Android, iOS, and the web, supporting listening offline, in the background, and casting for all US users, with or without Premium  —  YouTube Music is officially adding podcasts to its platform in the United States on Android, iOS and the web.

item.title: BuzzFeed CEOのジョナ・ペレッティは、「高度にキュレーションされた」独立系クリエイターからのコンテンツを大幅に増やし、クリエイターのレジデンスプログラムを導入する予定だ（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
BuzzFeed CEO Jonah Peretti plans to significantly increase content from “highly curated” independent creators and introduce a creators' residency program  —  BuzzFeed plans to significantly increase the amount of content it produces via independent internet creators, CEO Jonah Peretti told Axios in an interview.

item.title: イーロン・マスクの買収以降、Twitterは全世界で971件の政府命令を受け、808件に完全準拠し、準拠率は83％、マスク以前は50％だった（Russell Brandom/Rest of World）。
item.description:
Russell Brandom / Rest of World:
Since Elon Musk's takeover, Twitter has received 971 government orders globally and has fully complied with 808, an 83% compliance rate, vs. ~50% before Musk  —  The company has not refused a single request since Musk took ownership, according to self-reported data

item.title: Meta、リール発売以来Instagramの利用時間が24%以上伸びたと発表、第1四半期の売上高は前年同期比3%増の286億ドル、純利益は同24%減の57億ドル (Darrell Etherington/TechCrunch)
item.description:
Darrell Etherington / TechCrunch:
Meta says time spent on Instagram has grown 24%+ since Reels launched; the company reports Q1 revenue up 3% YoY to $28.6B and net income down 24% YoY to $5.7B  —  Meta shared some updated engagement info around its platforms on its Q1 2023 quarterly earnings call on Wednesday …

item.title: Apple、2023年1月までの半年間でApple BooksとPodcastsの有料会員を利用した欧州連合のユーザーは月平均1M未満と報告（Benjamin Mayo/9to5Mac）
item.description:
Benjamin Mayo / 9to5Mac:
Apple reports fewer than 1M users in the Europe Union per month used Apple Books and Podcasts paid subscriptions on average in the six months up to January 2023  —  In order to comply with the European Digital Services Act, Apple has been forced to reveal the number of monthly active users …
